text:
'Jersey Shore: Family Vacation' has just released its season 2 teaser and it looks exciting. From the sneak peak available, season 2 looks to be full of more drama, babies, and apparently weddings. In the clip, viewers get a glimpse of Ronnie-Ortiz Magro and his baby. It is no secret that the last year has been nothing but drama and chaos for Ronnie with his baby mama Jen Harley. However, from the season 2 teaser, Ronnie can be seen cuddling his child and only time will tell what new drama Ronnie and his baggage will bring to the table.

'Jersey Shore: Family Vacation' Season 2 Gets Premiere Date & Teaser - Watch Now! https://t.co/yEBNox8433 pic.twitter.com/e1m6dPrMAd — DJ Katrina 💋 (@KatrinaK_DJ) July 26, 2018

Deena Nicole Cortese shares some massive news and reveals that she is pregnant. The look on 'Snooki' Polizzi's face is absolutely priceless when Deena makes her huge announcement. The reality TV star had revealed her pregnancy to the public via Instagram in early July 2018. Deena captioned the post, "Chris and I decided to wait until we were ready to spill the beans!"

"Now that we are safely into our second trimester…us and our little monkey are ready to tell the world Our little family is growing! We have a sweet little boy on the way! We Are truly blessed and our hearts are filled with so much joy and happiness," she continued. December can't come soon enough! Daddy and Mommy can't wait to meet you Christopher John you are going to be the most spoiled little boy ever!!!!" she added.

In the small teaser, viewers see Vinny Gaudagnino getting slapped and also get a glimpse of a "wedding". 'Jersey Shore: Family Vacation' is all set to return to MTV on August 23.

You can watch the season 2 teaser below.
title: 'Jersey Shore: Family Vacation' season 2 teaser features drama, babies, and weddings
